医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超吸收性聚合物珠与儿童肠梗阻病例增加有关在过去的十年里，吸水珠对儿童的危害越来越大，因为吞下吸水珠的儿童可能会出现肠梗阻等危及生命的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Superabsorbent-polymer-beads-linked-to-increasing-cases-of-bowel-obstruction-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Superabsorbent-polymer-beads-linked-to-increasing-cases-of-bowel-obstruction-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=394ef5f4-d3af-4db1-8983-a7655ba53f30 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:46:38 -0400 Superabsorbent polymer beads linked to increasing cases of bowel obstruction in children
世卫组织公布 2025 年流感疫苗推荐病毒成分世界卫生组织 (WHO) 今天公布了针对南半球 2025 年流感季流感疫苗病毒成分的建议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/WHO-announces-recommended-viral-composition-for-2025-influenza-vaccines.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/WHO-announces-recommended-viral-composition-for-2025-influenza-vaccines.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b8a76741-b5ea-41b0-b412-4f2bf5c16ef8 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:40:16 -0400 WHO announces recommended viral composition for 2025 influenza vaccines
研究显示海马体中的单个脑细胞如何对代词做出反应一项新的研究显示了海马体中的单个脑细胞如何对代词做出反应。 “这可能有助于我们弄清楚我们是如何记住所读内容的。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-shows-how-individual-brain-cells-in-the-hippocampus-respond-to-pronouns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-shows-how-individual-brain-cells-in-the-hippocampus-respond-to-pronouns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c32d3ee-123d-451b-be7c-f3457178fb28 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:37:28 -0400 Study shows how individual brain cells in the hippocampus respond to pronouns
研究发现雌激素可以促进没有受体的乳腺癌肿瘤生长众所周知，雌激素会促进携带其受体的乳腺癌细胞的肿瘤生长，但杜克癌症研究所研究人员的一项新研究出人意料地发现，雌激素在促进没有受体的乳腺癌以及许多其他癌症的生长中发挥了作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Estrogen-found-to-promote-tumor-growth-in-breast-cancers-without-receptors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Estrogen-found-to-promote-tumor-growth-in-breast-cancers-without-receptors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00d7629f-d219-4720-8275-0ad8f2c4f974 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:34:53 -0400 Estrogen found to promote tumor growth in breast cancers without receptors
研究强调靶向巨噬细胞改善类风湿性关节炎结果的潜力目前，爱尔兰有 40,000 人患有类风湿性关节炎 (RA)，目前尚无治愈方法。据估计，该疾病每年每位患者花费 20,000 欧元，卫生系统的总成本约为 5.44 亿欧元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-highlights-pottial-for-targeting-macrophages-to-improve-rheumatoid-arthritis-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-highlights-pottial-for-targeting-macrophages-to-improve-rheumatoid-arthritis-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e151ada3-9508-4bb3-9acf-36298cd3b22c Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:29:04 -0400 Study highlights potential for targeting macrophages to improve rheumatoid arthritis outcomes
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款研究扩张型心肌病如何进展为心力衰竭亚利桑那大学菲尼克斯医学院的一名研究人员最近获得了美国国立卫生研究院 190 万美元的资助，用于研究扩张型心肌病如何进展为心力衰竭的分子机制，这最终可能为心力衰竭带来更好的预防和治疗选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/NIH-awards-grant-to-study-how-dilated-cardiomyopathy-progresses-to-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/NIH-awards-grant-to-study-how-dilated-cardiomyopathy-progresses-to-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebab5893-7511-44f9-881b-d2fdfa67f275 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:04:37 -0400 NIH awards grant to study how dilated cardiomyopathy progresses to heart failure
DNA修复机制缺陷与亨廷顿病进展相关麦克马斯特大学的研究人员发现，亨廷顿舞蹈症患者体内的突变蛋白质无法按预期修复 DNA，从而影响脑细胞自我修复的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Defective-DNA-repair-mechanism-linked-to-Huntingtons-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Defective-DNA-repair-mechanism-linked-to-Huntingtons-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc698a38-2b9c-448f-a5aa-9142b61592d8 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 22:01:24 -0400 Defective DNA repair mechanism linked to Huntington's disease progression
新方法结合谷氨酰胺酶和 HuR 阻断来抑制乳腺癌生长巴西研究人员领导的一项研究发表在《自然通讯》杂志上，该研究提出，同时靶向谷氨酰胺酶和 HuR 蛋白（这两种酶对肿瘤进展至关重要）可能会有效治疗乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Novel-approach-combines-谷氨酰胺酶-and-HuR-blockade-to-suppress-breast-cancer-growth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Novel-approach-combines-谷氨酰胺酶-and-HuR-blockade-to-suppress-breast-cancer-growth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1bfff27-593f-4db5-abe3-f3f10fa60b77 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 21:57:34 -0400 Novel approach combines glutaminase and HuR blockade to suppress breast cancer growth
语音识别技术对构音障碍患者有显着效果当马克·长谷川-约翰逊梳理他最新项目的数据时，他惊喜地发现了佛罗伦萨鸡蛋的配方。他说，筛选数百小时的录音录音将发现一两个宝藏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Speech-recognition-technology-shows-significant-gains-for-people-with-dysarthria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Speech-recognition-technology-shows-significant-gains-for-people-with-dysarthria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b16a5d8f-8347-472d-bc65-968b17ed6ef3 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 21:52:29 -0400 Speech recognition technology shows significant gains for people with dysarthria
研究显示制药业在美国赞助临床试验的数量不断增加Fred Hutch 癌症中心的研究人员发现，与联邦政府支持的临床试验相比，过去十年美国癌症患者参与制药行业赞助的临床试验的比例大幅增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-reveals-rising-pharmaceutical-industry-spoken-clinical-trials-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Study-reveals-rising-pharmaceutical-industry-spoken-clinical-trials-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=20bc9eac-aa36-4db6-8794-5aa574b5905b Fri, 27 Sep 2024 21:44:09 -0400 Study reveals rising pharmaceutical industry sponsored clinical trials in the U.S.
